thread.title: Weekend in Paris
thread.title_full: Weekend in Paris - Review of Hotel Joyce - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gianluca M
title: Weekend in Paris
text:
We had a great time at Hotel Joyce-Astotel:
First of all the people from reception to breakfast area and housekeeping were really polite and friendly and helpful.
The room was really clean and large for Paris standard with really comfortable bed.
Bathtub was a plus. Free soft drinks in the room! (Room 502)
Breakfast was good and we did like the open bar during the day and night.
The hotel is also in a great position near Pigalle and St George metro station;
From the hotel you can reach with just a ten minutes stroll Montmartre/Sacre Coeur with lots of bars and restaurants or you can reach Opera' and La fayette Magasins on the opposite side.
We would highly recommend this hotel for the excellent quality/price ratio.
Room Tip: Room 502 , really nice and quiet at night See more room tips
